meanings.definition: A cut of meat taken from the ribs of an animal, typically pork.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious sparerib for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is their mouth-watering sparerib dish.
meanings.sent3: At the barbecue, everyone fought over the last sparerib.
meanings.sent4: The sparerib was so tender, it practically fell off the bone.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling sparerib filled the room.

meanings.definition: A sparerib dish, often grilled or barbecued.
meanings.sent1: Dad grilled the sparerib to perfection on the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed a picnic with sparerib as the main course.
meanings.sent3: The sparerib was so tasty; it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The smoky flavor of the sparerib reminded them of summer days.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the sparerib cooking made everyone hungry.
